Name: Vanilla Latte
Description: Fresh, fragrant vanilla in a classic beverage.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Fresca, permufada vainilla en una bebida clásica.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Frische, duftende Vanille in einem klassischen Getränk.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Friss, illatos vanília egy klasszikus italban.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 新鮮で香り高いバニラをお馴染みの飲み物に。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Baunilha fresca e perfumada em uma bebida clássica.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Свежая ароматная ваниль в классическом напитке.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 加入了新鲜芬芳的香草的经典饮品。
